extendedInfo.description: #1 SPORTS GAME!!! Our hit game is now on Android!The NBA is back! Get in the spirit with this super addictive basketball game!Weâre Dude Perfectâ¢âthe YouTube guys that bring you the worldâs craziest basketball shotsâand weâre thrilled to introduce the first ever trick-shot basketball game! Prove you have what it takes to master the art of the trick-shot by taking, and making, the most epic shots imaginable!Few can handle the challenge: a killer combination physics-based puzzler and super addictive sports adventure!AVERAGE REVIEW SCORE of 4.79 / 5 STARS!!!!Thanks so much for the incredible support!âââââââââââââCool Things:âRIDICULOUSLY ADDICTIVEEndless hours of rim-rattling, fist-pumping, that-just-happened, net-swishing fun!âSTUNNING HD GRAPHICSPerfectly optimized for your killer Android Phone or Tablet.âFAMILY FRIENDLYMade with your kids in mind... just be careful you don't play it more than they do!â CUSTOM LEVEL EDITORCREATE your own SWEET LEVELS with the CUSTOM LEVEL EDITOR available in the DP store! âMULTIPLAYERFor massive multiplayer awesomeness, BATTLE against your best friendsâor arch enemies.âââââââââââââ"The game 'Dude Perfect' just might be the next Angry Birds" - Android Spin"It reminds me of a mix between Angry Birds and Paper Toss, only you are playing Basketball, and itâs loads of fun" - Android Community"I was a fan of Dude Perfect as soon as I saw the first video. When I heard there was an app for them I downloaded it immediately. I knew it was going to be awesome but the app completely surpassed my expectations! It's a great game and every phone should have it." - 5 STAR User Review"physics based puzzle style, sports action, and awesome graphics" - AndroidCommunity.com"the graphics and physics are top-notch" - Android-Game.com"With March Madness around the corner, we want to give everyone at least one game they can count on" - Tyler, Dude Perfect's "Bearded Guy"âââââââââââââHang out with us online!Twitter: @DudePerfectYouTube.com/DudePerfect Facebook.com/DudePerfect

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Physics aren\'t the same from shot to shot, and the aiming is backwards which makes it hard to be accurate. I\'ll wait for an update before requesting a refund. Sense like fun otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: I can\'t save my replays.  And I don\'t like how I have to bounce the ball a lot, takes the skill out of it.  I like making epic swishes, not bounce the ball a billion times to get points.  And the 3 ball thing is annoying.  I just restart if I miss my first shot, because you get less points if you don\'t.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wth
reviews.comment: The controls are awful .. Aiming system isnt the best.   Concept and graphics are good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must Have
reviews.comment: Game is epic. It\'s like angry birds, but better. a replay feature would be nice, because i want to show my friends the crazy shots i make, but its all good. good job guys!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: I\'m an actual fan of this game but on my Galaxy S4, this game doesn\'t work entirely. Everytime I try to play on the stage Ranch, it throws me to my home screen. FIX THIS ASAP!
reviews.author: Waskar Beras

reviews.title: Its an okay game
reviews.comment: The gameplay and graphics are good, but there is a bit too much luck involved in this game. It is nog that you can become very good at it ,it is just doing it enough to reach the 3 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aiming is horrible
reviews.comment: This is pretty much a \"click and hope for the best.\
No reviews given!

reviews.title: terrible
reviews.comment: this was the shitiest game i have ever played it is immpossible to get the ball in the hoop with right amount of score on the later levels .  It is a stupid waste of time and money and the idiots that made it so hard should fix it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Amazing best game on android nice love dude perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game sucks
reviews.comment: You basically just chuck it up in any direction and just wait for it to eventually bounce in. To hard to judge how hard to shoot it. Also the ball bounce forever so when you do miss you have to wait about a minute till you can take the next one. Boring and slow paced. One.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I wish I can get my dollar back
reviews.comment: Very bad gameplay and point system. You would think if you make it in without hitting anything, you would get the most pounts but no, its the more you hit the better. Waste of money.
reviews.author: Napu Candaso

reviews.title: Game crashes.
reviews.comment: Crashes everytime I try to play the first ranch level. Any reason why?
reviews.author: Cameron Briscoe

reviews.title: Fun and the graphics are SICK!!
reviews.comment: The game itself is hard, which is a good challenge. The graphics are very clear with little to no lagging, even with Jelly Bean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Sucked died on me at the ranch stage. I want my refund back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really awesome
reviews.comment: Every time I made a shot my friends and I would just scream \"oohhhhhh!!\". Really fun game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dude p
reviews.comment: This was one of the best games i have played i beat it in 1 day
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Excellent game, lot of trail and error mind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didnt work for my device but...
reviews.comment: Excellent speedy response by dev and got everything worked out. Look forward to when game will work for me, with a dev like this one. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: game, I would like to be able to save replays though, it would be nice to keep those amazing shots and also be able to invert the way you shoot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: error
reviews.comment: i purchased the game and its not downloaded. i\'m so disappointed.:(  the app is downloaded into my phone after ard 2-3hrs.for this i will rate it a four star. great game thou.
reviews.author: Tan Chin Yong
